sentences.sentence: Any neurologically normal human will come to possess a language.
sentences.translation: 任何神经上正常的人类，都能够掌握一种语言。

sentences.sentence: Men need to be motivated and have their pelvic floor neurologically intact.
sentences.translation: 这些患者需要运动以保持其骨盆神经的完整性。

sentences.sentence: Such future humans will likely differ greatly from us culturally or even neurologically.
sentences.translation: 这样的未来人类将与现在的我们在文化上甚至神经类型上都会有巨大差别。
